php.LBL_PROXY_INFORMATION:
System places that communicate with external servers: 
 - Secure password search engine - Yetiforce server, 
 - Language installation - Github server, 
 - Integration with Magento - Magento server, OpenStreetMap server, servers indicated by the user in the configuration, 
 - Communication with the update server - Github server, 
 - Communication with the registration server - Yetiforce server, OpenStreetMap server and servers indicated by the user in the configuration, 
 - Update of exchange rates - Bank servers (NBP, CBR, ECB), 
 - Installation and update of libraries - Github server
